citations.narrative:
The facility did not submit their fiscal year 2024 annual report to the Deputy Administrator on or before December 1 of
calendar year 2024. At the time of inspection, the facility’s annual report was under review for submission to USDA.
Timely submission of the annual report is essential to assure that professionally acceptable standards governing the care
and use of animals were followed during the previous fiscal year. Each reporting facility shall submit an annual report,
covering the use of live animals in the previous fiscal year, on or before December 1st of each calendar year. Correct by
February 27, 2025.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.36(a) 
   
Annual report. 
The facility did not submit their fiscal year 2024 annual report to the Deputy Administrator on or before December 1 of 
calendar year 2024. At the time of inspection, the facility’s annual report was under review for submission to USDA. 
Timely submission of the annual report is essential to assure that professionally acceptable standards governing the care 
and use of animals were followed during the previous fiscal year. Each reporting facility shall submit an annual report, 
covering the use of live animals in the previous fiscal year, on or before December 1st of each calendar year. Correct by 
February 27, 2025. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
 n
